entry.title: 更改IP并安装Docker
entry.content: 更改ip并安装Docker 1.Ubuntu更改IProot@ubuntu:~# vim /etc/netplan/50-cloud-init.yaml123456789101112network: ethernets: eth0: addresses: - 192.168.15.72/20 gateway4: 192.168.12.2 nameservers: addresses: - 223.5.5.5 search: [] optional: true version: 2 root@ubuntu:~# netplan apply2.安装Docker
